title: Security: Sanitize tool descriptions to prevent prompt injection
description: Tool descriptions from upstream servers are untrusted. Must sanitize during indexing to prevent prompt injection attacks. Part of Trust & Threat Model.
close_reason: Implemented description sanitization and execution gates with full test coverage

title: Integrate MCP TypeScript SDK (@modelcontextprotocol/sdk)
description: Add @modelcontextprotocol/sdk as dependency. Set up basic MCP server structure using the SDK. Configure stdio transport for initial implementation. Reference: https://github.com/modelcontextprotocol/typescript-sdk

title: Project setup: Initialize Bun + TypeScript project
description: Initialize the project with Bun and TypeScript. Set up tsconfig.json, package.json with proper scripts, and directory structure (src/, tests/, etc.). This is the foundation for all other work.

title: Implement selection caching (co-occurrence bundles)
description: Remember which tools are frequently used together. Creates co-occurrence bundles to improve tool suggestions based on usage patterns.

title: [EPIC] v0.3: Implement selection caching and detail levels (L0-L2)
Design: Namespacing strategy for tools with identical names from different servers
description: Open question: How to handle tools with identical names from different servers? Need to design and implement a namespacing strategy to disambiguate.

title: NFR: Memory footprint < 100MB RAM
description: Non-functional requirement: Meta-server process should use less than 100MB RAM. Requires efficient data structures and memory management.

title: [EPIC] v0.2: Support multiple upstream servers and hybrid search
Implement describe_tools API: describe_tools(tool_names) -> List[ToolSchema]
description: Public MCP-facing API that retrieves full schemas for specified tools. Used after find_tools to get L2 (Full Schema) detail level for execution.
close_reason: Implemented in McpSquaredServer with Cataloger and Retriever integration

title: NFR: Tool discovery latency < 50ms
description: Non-functional requirement: find_tools must complete in under 50ms. Requires efficient indexing and retrieval strategies.

title: Security: Implement execution gates for sensitive tools
description: Sensitive tools require explicit user confirmation before execution. Implement allowlists and confirmation prompts for tool execution. Part of Trust & Threat Model.
close_reason: Implemented description sanitization and execution gates with full test coverage

title: NFR: Cross-platform support (macOS, Linux priority; Windows later)
description: Non-functional requirement: Priority on macOS and Linux support. Windows support to follow in later releases.

title: API: Add search mode parameter to find_tools
description: Add mode parameter to find_tools API: 'fast' (FTS5 only, default), 'semantic' (vector similarity), 'hybrid' (FTS5 + rerank with embeddings). Update config schema to allow default mode selection. Ensure backward compatibility - mode defaults to 'fast'.

title: Implement change detection for upstream tool updates
description: Poll or listen for changes in upstream MCP server tools and update the local index accordingly. Addresses Context Rot problem.

title: Implement list_namespaces API: list_namespaces() -> List[string]
description: Optional public MCP-facing API that lists available namespaces. Helps with tool disambiguation when multiple servers have same-named tools.

title: Implement find_tools API: find_tools(query, limit) -> List[ToolSummary]
description: Public MCP-facing API that searches for tools by query string. Returns list of tool summaries with configurable limit (default 5). Core discovery mechanism for clients.
close_reason: Implemented in McpSquaredServer with Cataloger and Retriever integration

title: Storage: Add vector embeddings to SQLite index
description: Extend IndexStore to support vector embeddings for semantic search. Options: 1) sqlite-vec extension for native vector ops, 2) Store as BLOB and compute similarity in JS. Need to store 384-dim float32 vectors (~1.5KB per tool). Consider indexing strategy for fast similarity search.

title: Research: Optimal strategy for local embedding generation
description: Open question: What is the optimal strategy for local embedding generation? Need to balance performance vs quality for semantic search capabilities.
close_reason: Research complete: Recommend Transformers.js + BGE-small-en-v1.5 (q8) with WASM backend for Bun compatibility. Dual-mode architecture: FTS5 default + optional semantic search.

title: Implement Composer: Construct detail levels (L0-L2) for responses
description: Constructs appropriate detail level for responses: L0 (Name Only), L1 (Summary: Description + simplified signature), L2 (Full Schema: complete JSON schema for execution).

title: Implement execute API: execute(tool_name, arguments) -> Result
description: Public MCP-facing API that proxies tool execution to upstream servers. Routes call to correct upstream server based on tool name.
close_reason: Implemented in McpSquaredServer with Cataloger and Retriever integration

title: Build: Test standalone binary compilation with bun build --compile
description: Test Bun's compile feature to produce standalone executables. Validate: 1) Binary includes runtime + WASM embedding model, 2) Works on macOS arm64/x64 and Linux x64, 3) Acceptable binary size (<100MB target), 4) No runtime dependencies for end users. This enables distribution without requiring Bun installation.

title: Implement Executor: Handle call_tool requests and route to upstream
description: Handles execute requests from clients and proxies them to the appropriate upstream MCP server. Must route to correct upstream based on tool name.
close_reason: Implemented in McpSquaredServer with Cataloger and Retriever integration

title: Implement Retriever: Search logic for find_tools
description: Implements hybrid retrieval supporting both lexical (keyword) and semantic (embedding-based) search for tools. Must return results in <50ms.
close_reason: Implemented Retriever with FTS search and Cataloger-to-Index sync

title: Design and implement configuration file format
description: Design config file format (YAML or JSON) for storing: upstream server connections (name, transport, endpoint), tool allowlists/blocklists, security settings. Config TUI will read/write this file.

title: Design: Handle session state in upstream servers
description: Open question: How to handle 'session' state in upstream MCP servers? Need to design session management for stateful upstream connections.

title: NFR: Background index rebuild without blocking requests
description: Non-functional requirement: Index rebuilding should happen in background without blocking incoming requests. Ensures availability during updates.

title: Implement CLI entry point with --config flag handling
description: Create main CLI entry point that: 1) With no args: starts MCP server (stdio mode), 2) With --config: launches interactive TUI for configuration. Use Bun's native arg parsing or a lightweight CLI library.

title: Integrate OpenTUI for CLI configuration interface
description: Add opentui as dependency for interactive TUI. Will be used for the --config mode to configure upstream servers, allowlists, and other settings. Reference: https://github.com/anomalyco/opentui

title: Implement Cataloger: Manage connections to upstream MCP servers (stdio, SSE)
description: Core component that connects to upstream MCP servers. Must support both stdio and SSE transports. Aggregates capabilities from all connected servers.
close_reason: Implemented Cataloger with stdio and SSE transport support, connection management, tool aggregation, and call routing

title: [EPIC] MVP: Connect to 1 upstream server, index it, expose find_tools
close_reason: MVP complete: Cataloger, Index, Retriever, and all 3 meta-tool APIs implemented

title: Prototype: Test Transformers.js + WASM embeddings in Bun
description: Test embedding generation with Transformers.js using WASM backend in Bun runtime. Validate: 1) BGE-small-en-v1.5 (q8) model loads correctly, 2) Inference latency <50ms on CPU, 3) WASM backend works without native bindings. This validates the technical approach before full integration.

title: Security: Implement tool allowlists
description: Allow users to configure which tools are exposed to the LLM. Supports security-conscious users who want to control tool access.

title: Implement Index: Local vector/keyword store for tool definitions
description: Local storage using SQLite + FTS + local embedding model. Stores servers, tools, and embeddings. Data model: servers {id, name, transport_config, status}, tools {id, server_id, name, description, schema_hash, last_updated}, embeddings {tool_id, vector}.
close_reason: Implemented IndexStore with SQLite + FTS5 for tool storage and full-text search
